<Link id="l00093" /><CodeLine lineNumber="93"><Highlight kind="comment">  /// \\Returns &lt;NumElts x ElemTy&gt;.</Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00094" /><CodeLine lineNumber="94"><Highlight kind="comment">  /// It works for both scalar and vector \\p ElemTy.</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal"></Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00095" /><CodeLine lineNumber="95" lineLink="/docs/api/classes/llvm/sandboxir/vecutils/#a77936f3aa272a4d31b547919e87b85d6"><Highlight kind="normal">  </Highlight><Highlight kind="keyword">static</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal"> <a href="/docs/api/classes/llvm/sandboxir/type">Type</a> &#42;<a href="/docs/api/classes/llvm/sandboxir/vecutils/#a77936f3aa272a4d31b547919e87b85d6">getWideType</a>(<a href="/docs/api/classes/llvm/sandboxir/type">Type</a> &#42;ElemTy, </Highlight><Highlight kind="keywordtype">unsigned</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal"> NumElts) &#123;</Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00096" /><CodeLine lineNumber="96"><Highlight kind="normal">    </Highlight><Highlight kind="keywordflow">if</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal"> (ElemTy-&gt;<a href="/docs/api/classes/llvm/sandboxir/type/#ab72c549a3c63bf2f0093dc66b8a50e49">isVectorTy</a>()) &#123;</Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00097" /><CodeLine lineNumber="97"><Highlight kind="normal">      </Highlight><Highlight kind="keyword">auto</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal"> &#42;VecTy = <a href="/docs/api/namespaces/llvm/#ac4fc845f5ed92de63cd4474f128f5fc5">cast&lt;FixedVectorType&gt;</a>(ElemTy);</Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00098" /><CodeLine lineNumber="98"><Highlight kind="normal">      ElemTy = VecTy-&gt;getElementType();</Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00099" /><CodeLine lineNumber="99"><Highlight kind="normal">      NumElts = VecTy-&gt;getNumElements() &#42; NumElts;</Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00100" /><CodeLine lineNumber="100"><Highlight kind="normal">    &#125;</Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00101" /><CodeLine lineNumber="101"><Highlight kind="normal">    </Highlight><Highlight kind="keywordflow">return</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal"> <a href="/docs/api/classes/llvm/sandboxir/fixedvectortype/#a57efbbb713b15812ad4fa3770e8a9ead">FixedVectorType::get</a>(ElemTy, NumElts);</Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00102" /><CodeLine lineNumber="102"><Highlight kind="normal">  &#125;</Highlight><Highlight kind="comment"></Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00103" /><CodeLine lineNumber="103"><Highlight kind="comment">  /// \\Returns the instruction in \\p Instrs that is lowest in the BB. Expects</Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00104" /><CodeLine lineNumber="104"><Highlight kind="comment">  /// that all instructions are in the same BB.</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal"></Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00105" /><CodeLine lineNumber="105" lineLink="/docs/api/classes/llvm/sandboxir/vecutils/#a089cccbe66baa77d85c8a291030c7796"><Highlight kind="normal">  </Highlight><Highlight kind="keyword">static</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal"> <a href="/docs/api/classes/llvm/sandboxir/instruction">Instruction</a> &#42;<a href="/docs/api/classes/llvm/sandboxir/vecutils/#a089cccbe66baa77d85c8a291030c7796">getLowest</a>(<a href="/docs/api/classes/llvm/arrayref">ArrayRef&lt;Instruction &#42;&gt;</a> Instrs) &#123;</Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00106" /><CodeLine lineNumber="106"><Highlight kind="normal">    <a href="/docs/api/classes/llvm/sandboxir/instruction">Instruction</a> &#42;LowestI = Instrs.<a href="/docs/api/classes/llvm/arrayref/#a721fc555cb3d8dc2a1a680dcc2ce69b2">front</a>();</Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00107" /><CodeLine lineNumber="107"><Highlight kind="normal">    </Highlight><Highlight kind="keywordflow">for</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal"> (</Highlight><Highlight kind="keyword">auto</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal"> &#42;<a href="/docs/api/files/lib/lib/support/md5-cpp/#ac0eafdc9ee161b71e7af98af736952fd">I</a> : <a href="/docs/api/namespaces/llvm/#a02981de53fb6ffd384d39addc4d25f37">drop&#95;begin</a>(Instrs)) &#123;</Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00108" /><CodeLine lineNumber="108"><Highlight kind="normal">      </Highlight><Highlight kind="keywordflow">if</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal"> (LowestI-&gt;<a href="/docs/api/classes/llvm/sandboxir/instruction/#ad1664de8206ba30fc8d13a01850f42db">comesBefore</a>(<a href="/docs/api/files/lib/lib/support/md5-cpp/#ac0eafdc9ee161b71e7af98af736952fd">I</a>))</Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00109" /><CodeLine lineNumber="109"><Highlight kind="normal">        LowestI = <a href="/docs/api/files/lib/lib/support/md5-cpp/#ac0eafdc9ee161b71e7af98af736952fd">I</a>;</Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00110" /><CodeLine lineNumber="110"><Highlight kind="normal">    &#125;</Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00111" /><CodeLine lineNumber="111"><Highlight kind="normal">    </Highlight><Highlight kind="keywordflow">return</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal"> LowestI;</Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00112" /><CodeLine lineNumber="112"><Highlight kind="normal">  &#125;</Highlight><Highlight kind="comment"></Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00113" /><CodeLine lineNumber="113"><Highlight kind="comment">  /// \\Returns the lowest instruction in \\p Vals, or nullptr if no instructions</Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00114" /><CodeLine lineNumber="114"><Highlight kind="comment">  /// are found. Skips instructions not in \\p BB.</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal"></Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00115" /><CodeLine lineNumber="115" lineLink="/docs/api/classes/llvm/sandboxir/vecutils/#a47d4037afa835a57270728d8d3ffb051"><Highlight kind="normal">  </Highlight><Highlight kind="keyword">static</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal"> <a href="/docs/api/classes/llvm/sandboxir/instruction">Instruction</a> &#42;<a href="/docs/api/classes/llvm/sandboxir/vecutils/#a47d4037afa835a57270728d8d3ffb051">getLowest</a>(<a href="/docs/api/classes/llvm/arrayref">ArrayRef&lt;Value &#42;&gt;</a> Vals, <a href="/docs/api/namespaces/llvm/sandboxir/#a60f87746e4945fda7ea3d5a983c9b62c">BasicBlock</a> &#42;BB) &#123;</Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00116" /><CodeLine lineNumber="116"><Highlight kind="normal">    </Highlight><Highlight kind="comment">// Find the first Instruction in Vals that is also in &#96;BB&#96;.</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal"></Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00117" /><CodeLine lineNumber="117"><Highlight kind="normal">    </Highlight><Highlight kind="keyword">auto</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal"> It = <a href="/docs/api/namespaces/llvm/#ac78c09ae232b2ce188ff590d51e3c268">find&#95;if</a>(Vals, &#91;BB&#93;(<a href="/docs/api/classes/llvm/sandboxir/value">Value</a> &#42;V) &#123;</Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00118" /><CodeLine lineNumber="118"><Highlight kind="normal">      </Highlight><Highlight kind="keywordflow">return</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal"> <a href="/docs/api/namespaces/llvm/#a92ca992e52dddc420f4b069cae06dfbe">isa&lt;Instruction&gt;</a>(V) &amp;&amp; <a href="/docs/api/namespaces/llvm/#ac4fc845f5ed92de63cd4474f128f5fc5">cast&lt;Instruction&gt;</a>(V)-&gt;getParent() == BB;</Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00119" /><CodeLine lineNumber="119"><Highlight kind="normal">    &#125;);</Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00120" /><CodeLine lineNumber="120"><Highlight kind="normal">    </Highlight><Highlight kind="comment">// If we couldn&#39;t find an instruction return nullptr.</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal"></Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00121" /><CodeLine lineNumber="121"><Highlight kind="normal">    </Highlight><Highlight kind="keywordflow">if</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal"> (It == Vals.<a href="/docs/api/classes/llvm/arrayref/#a7ca5197533a9c1fb8a2bd30587fcec6b">end</a>())</Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00122" /><CodeLine lineNumber="122"><Highlight kind="normal">      </Highlight><Highlight kind="keywordflow">return</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal"> </Highlight><Highlight kind="keyword">nullptr</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal">;</Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00123" /><CodeLine lineNumber="123"><Highlight kind="normal">    <a href="/docs/api/classes/llvm/sandboxir/instruction">Instruction</a> &#42;FirstI = <a href="/docs/api/namespaces/llvm/#ac4fc845f5ed92de63cd4474f128f5fc5">cast&lt;Instruction&gt;</a>(&#42;It);</Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00124" /><CodeLine lineNumber="124"><Highlight kind="normal">    </Highlight><Highlight kind="comment">// Now look for the lowest instruction in Vals starting from one position</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal"></Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00125" /><CodeLine lineNumber="125"><Highlight kind="normal">    </Highlight><Highlight kind="comment">// after FirstI.</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal"></Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00126" /><CodeLine lineNumber="126"><Highlight kind="normal">    <a href="/docs/api/classes/llvm/sandboxir/instruction">Instruction</a> &#42;LowestI = FirstI;</Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00127" /><CodeLine lineNumber="127"><Highlight kind="normal">    </Highlight><Highlight kind="keywordflow">for</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal"> (</Highlight><Highlight kind="keyword">auto</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal"> &#42;V : <a href="/docs/api/namespaces/llvm/#a341215803e83773a3e97860dc291f121">make&#95;range</a>(std::next(It), Vals.<a href="/docs/api/classes/llvm/arrayref/#a7ca5197533a9c1fb8a2bd30587fcec6b">end</a>())) &#123;</Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00128" /><CodeLine lineNumber="128"><Highlight kind="normal">      </Highlight><Highlight kind="keyword">auto</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal"> &#42;<a href="/docs/api/files/lib/lib/support/md5-cpp/#ac0eafdc9ee161b71e7af98af736952fd">I</a> = <a href="/docs/api/namespaces/llvm/#a22eeee01734061ac1b31ccd994c49eef">dyn&#95;cast&lt;Instruction&gt;</a>(V);</Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00129" /><CodeLine lineNumber="129"><Highlight kind="normal">      </Highlight><Highlight kind="comment">// Skip non-instructions.</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal"></Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00130" /><CodeLine lineNumber="130"><Highlight kind="normal">      </Highlight><Highlight kind="keywordflow">if</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal"> (<a href="/docs/api/files/lib/lib/support/md5-cpp/#ac0eafdc9ee161b71e7af98af736952fd">I</a> == </Highlight><Highlight kind="keyword">nullptr</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal">)</Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00131" /><CodeLine lineNumber="131"><Highlight kind="normal">        </Highlight><Highlight kind="keywordflow">continue</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal">;</Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00132" /><CodeLine lineNumber="132"><Highlight kind="normal">      </Highlight><Highlight kind="comment">// Skips instructions not in \\p BB.</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal"></Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00133" /><CodeLine lineNumber="133"><Highlight kind="normal">      </Highlight><Highlight kind="keywordflow">if</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal"> (<a href="/docs/api/files/lib/lib/support/md5-cpp/#ac0eafdc9ee161b71e7af98af736952fd">I</a>-&gt;getParent() != BB)</Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00134" /><CodeLine lineNumber="134"><Highlight kind="normal">        </Highlight><Highlight kind="keywordflow">continue</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal">;</Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00135" /><CodeLine lineNumber="135"><Highlight kind="normal">      </Highlight><Highlight kind="comment">// If &#96;LowestI&#96; comes before &#96;I&#96; then &#96;I&#96; is the new lowest.</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal"></Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00136" /><CodeLine lineNumber="136"><Highlight kind="normal">      </Highlight><Highlight kind="keywordflow">if</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal"> (LowestI-&gt;<a href="/docs/api/classes/llvm/sandboxir/instruction/#ad1664de8206ba30fc8d13a01850f42db">comesBefore</a>(<a href="/docs/api/files/lib/lib/support/md5-cpp/#ac0eafdc9ee161b71e7af98af736952fd">I</a>))</Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00137" /><CodeLine lineNumber="137"><Highlight kind="normal">        LowestI = <a href="/docs/api/files/lib/lib/support/md5-cpp/#ac0eafdc9ee161b71e7af98af736952fd">I</a>;</Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00138" /><CodeLine lineNumber="138"><Highlight kind="normal">    &#125;</Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00139" /><CodeLine lineNumber="139"><Highlight kind="normal">    </Highlight><Highlight kind="keywordflow">return</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal"> LowestI;</Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00140" /><CodeLine lineNumber="140"><Highlight kind="normal">  &#125;</Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00141" /><CodeLine lineNumber="141"><Highlight kind="normal"></Highlight><Highlight kind="comment"></Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00142" /><CodeLine lineNumber="142"><Highlight kind="comment">  /// If \\p I is not a PHI it returns it. Else it walks down the instruction</Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00143" /><CodeLine lineNumber="143"><Highlight kind="comment">  /// chain looking for the last PHI and returns it. \\Returns nullptr if \\p I is</Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00144" /><CodeLine lineNumber="144"><Highlight kind="comment">  /// nullptr.</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal"></Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00145" /><CodeLine lineNumber="145" lineLink="/docs/api/classes/llvm/sandboxir/vecutils/#a44997afa363c2b4d0d083e8b8930f1af"><Highlight kind="normal">  </Highlight><Highlight kind="keyword">static</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal"> <a href="/docs/api/classes/llvm/sandboxir/instruction">Instruction</a> &#42;<a href="/docs/api/classes/llvm/sandboxir/vecutils/#a44997afa363c2b4d0d083e8b8930f1af">getLastPHIOrSelf</a>(<a href="/docs/api/classes/llvm/sandboxir/instruction">Instruction</a> &#42;<a href="/docs/api/files/lib/lib/support/md5-cpp/#ac0eafdc9ee161b71e7af98af736952fd">I</a>) &#123;</Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00146" /><CodeLine lineNumber="146"><Highlight kind="normal">    <a href="/docs/api/classes/llvm/sandboxir/instruction">Instruction</a> &#42;LastI = <a href="/docs/api/files/lib/lib/support/md5-cpp/#ac0eafdc9ee161b71e7af98af736952fd">I</a>;</Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00147" /><CodeLine lineNumber="147"><Highlight kind="normal">    </Highlight><Highlight kind="keywordflow">while</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal"> (<a href="/docs/api/files/lib/lib/support/md5-cpp/#ac0eafdc9ee161b71e7af98af736952fd">I</a> != </Highlight><Highlight kind="keyword">nullptr</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal"> &amp;&amp; <a href="/docs/api/namespaces/llvm/#a92ca992e52dddc420f4b069cae06dfbe">isa&lt;PHINode&gt;</a>(<a href="/docs/api/files/lib/lib/support/md5-cpp/#ac0eafdc9ee161b71e7af98af736952fd">I</a>)) &#123;</Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00148" /><CodeLine lineNumber="148"><Highlight kind="normal">      LastI = <a href="/docs/api/files/lib/lib/support/md5-cpp/#ac0eafdc9ee161b71e7af98af736952fd">I</a>;</Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00149" /><CodeLine lineNumber="149"><Highlight kind="normal">      <a href="/docs/api/files/lib/lib/support/md5-cpp/#ac0eafdc9ee161b71e7af98af736952fd">I</a> = <a href="/docs/api/files/lib/lib/support/md5-cpp/#ac0eafdc9ee161b71e7af98af736952fd">I</a>-&gt;getNextNode();</Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00150" /><CodeLine lineNumber="150"><Highlight kind="normal">    &#125;</Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00151" /><CodeLine lineNumber="151"><Highlight kind="normal">    </Highlight><Highlight kind="keywordflow">return</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal"> LastI;</Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00152" /><CodeLine lineNumber="152"><Highlight kind="normal">  &#125;</Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00153" /><CodeLine lineNumber="153"><Highlight kind="normal"></Highlight><Highlight kind="comment"></Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00154" /><CodeLine lineNumber="154"><Highlight kind="comment">  /// If all values in \\p Bndl are of the same scalar type then return it,</Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00155" /><CodeLine lineNumber="155"><Highlight kind="comment">  /// otherwise return nullptr.</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal"></Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00156" /><CodeLine lineNumber="156" lineLink="/docs/api/classes/llvm/sandboxir/vecutils/#a033de8f81a298858c0219b067c983618"><Highlight kind="normal">  </Highlight><Highlight kind="keyword">static</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal"> <a href="/docs/api/classes/llvm/sandboxir/type">Type</a> &#42;<a href="/docs/api/classes/llvm/sandboxir/vecutils/#a033de8f81a298858c0219b067c983618">tryGetCommonScalarType</a>(<a href="/docs/api/classes/llvm/arrayref">ArrayRef&lt;Value &#42;&gt;</a> Bndl) &#123;</Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00157" /><CodeLine lineNumber="157"><Highlight kind="normal">    <a href="/docs/api/classes/llvm/sandboxir/value">Value</a> &#42;V0 = Bndl&#91;0&#93;;</Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00158" /><CodeLine lineNumber="158"><Highlight kind="normal">    <a href="/docs/api/classes/llvm/sandboxir/type">Type</a> &#42;Ty0 = <a href="/docs/api/classes/llvm/sandboxir/utils/#a94ed4ff75262c5c7bf6107a1cb09d583">Utils::getExpectedType</a>(V0);</Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00159" /><CodeLine lineNumber="159"><Highlight kind="normal">    <a href="/docs/api/classes/llvm/sandboxir/type">Type</a> &#42;ScalarTy = <a href="/docs/api/classes/llvm/sandboxir/vecutils/#ab3b71740aabd9ed0695bae2780f0247d">VecUtils::getElementType</a>(Ty0);</Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00160" /><CodeLine lineNumber="160"><Highlight kind="normal">    </Highlight><Highlight kind="keywordflow">for</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal"> (</Highlight><Highlight kind="keyword">auto</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal"> &#42;V : <a href="/docs/api/namespaces/llvm/#a02981de53fb6ffd384d39addc4d25f37">drop&#95;begin</a>(Bndl)) &#123;</Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00161" /><CodeLine lineNumber="161"><Highlight kind="normal">      <a href="/docs/api/classes/llvm/sandboxir/type">Type</a> &#42;NTy = <a href="/docs/api/classes/llvm/sandboxir/utils/#a94ed4ff75262c5c7bf6107a1cb09d583">Utils::getExpectedType</a>(V);</Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00162" /><CodeLine lineNumber="162"><Highlight kind="normal">      <a href="/docs/api/classes/llvm/sandboxir/type">Type</a> &#42;NScalarTy = <a href="/docs/api/classes/llvm/sandboxir/vecutils/#ab3b71740aabd9ed0695bae2780f0247d">VecUtils::getElementType</a>(NTy);</Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00163" /><CodeLine lineNumber="163"><Highlight kind="normal">      </Highlight><Highlight kind="keywordflow">if</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal"> (NScalarTy != ScalarTy)</Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00164" /><CodeLine lineNumber="164"><Highlight kind="normal">        </Highlight><Highlight kind="keywordflow">return</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal"> </Highlight><Highlight kind="keyword">nullptr</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal">;</Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00165" /><CodeLine lineNumber="165"><Highlight kind="normal">    &#125;</Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00166" /><CodeLine lineNumber="166"><Highlight kind="normal">    </Highlight><Highlight kind="keywordflow">return</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal"> ScalarTy;</Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00167" /><CodeLine lineNumber="167"><Highlight kind="normal">  &#125;</Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00168" /><CodeLine lineNumber="168"><Highlight kind="normal"></Highlight><Highlight kind="comment"></Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00169" /><CodeLine lineNumber="169"><Highlight kind="comment">  /// Similar to tryGetCommonScalarType() but will assert that there is a common</Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00170" /><CodeLine lineNumber="170"><Highlight kind="comment">  /// type. So this is faster in release builds as it won&#39;t iterate through the</Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00171" /><CodeLine lineNumber="171"><Highlight kind="comment">  /// values.</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal"></Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00172" /><CodeLine lineNumber="172" lineLink="/docs/api/classes/llvm/sandboxir/vecutils/#a1d1c2bc5710b2b6ca489fed0de8f8c54"><Highlight kind="normal">  </Highlight><Highlight kind="keyword">static</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal"> <a href="/docs/api/classes/llvm/sandboxir/type">Type</a> &#42;<a href="/docs/api/classes/llvm/sandboxir/vecutils/#a1d1c2bc5710b2b6ca489fed0de8f8c54">getCommonScalarType</a>(<a href="/docs/api/classes/llvm/arrayref">ArrayRef&lt;Value &#42;&gt;</a> Bndl) &#123;</Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00173" /><CodeLine lineNumber="173"><Highlight kind="normal">    <a href="/docs/api/classes/llvm/sandboxir/value">Value</a> &#42;V0 = Bndl&#91;0&#93;;</Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00174" /><CodeLine lineNumber="174"><Highlight kind="normal">    <a href="/docs/api/classes/llvm/sandboxir/type">Type</a> &#42;Ty0 = <a href="/docs/api/classes/llvm/sandboxir/utils/#a94ed4ff75262c5c7bf6107a1cb09d583">Utils::getExpectedType</a>(V0);</Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00175" /><CodeLine lineNumber="175"><Highlight kind="normal">    <a href="/docs/api/classes/llvm/sandboxir/type">Type</a> &#42;ScalarTy = <a href="/docs/api/classes/llvm/sandboxir/vecutils/#ab3b71740aabd9ed0695bae2780f0247d">VecUtils::getElementType</a>(Ty0);</Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00176" /><CodeLine lineNumber="176"><Highlight kind="normal">    <a href="/docs/api/files/lib/lib/target/lib/target/amdgpu/silowercontrolflow-cpp/#a4868c5d81c5ccc98c47aeab6244346a0">assert</a>(<a href="/docs/api/classes/llvm/sandboxir/vecutils/#a033de8f81a298858c0219b067c983618">tryGetCommonScalarType</a>(Bndl) &amp;&amp; </Highlight><Highlight kind="stringliteral">&quot;Expected common scalar type!&quot;</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal">);</Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00177" /><CodeLine lineNumber="177"><Highlight kind="normal">    </Highlight><Highlight kind="keywordflow">return</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal"> ScalarTy;</Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00178" /><CodeLine lineNumber="178"><Highlight kind="normal">  &#125;</Highlight><Highlight kind="comment"></Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00179" /><CodeLine lineNumber="179"><Highlight kind="comment">  /// \\Returns the first integer power of 2 that is &lt;= Num.</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal"></Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00180" /><CodeLine lineNumber="180"><Highlight kind="normal">  </Highlight><Highlight kind="keyword">static</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal"> </Highlight><Highlight kind="keywordtype">unsigned</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal"> <a href="/docs/api/classes/llvm/sandboxir/vecutils/#afa56faa35b026a814f2fd65fd3016a4d">getFloorPowerOf2</a>(</Highlight><Highlight kind="keywordtype">unsigned</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal"> Num);</Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00181" /><CodeLine lineNumber="181"><Highlight kind="normal"></Highlight></CodeLine>

<Link id="l00185" /><CodeLine lineNumber="185"><Highlight kind="normal">  <a href="/docs/api/files/include/include/llvm/include/llvm/support/compiler-h/#aa863693eef567397d9c292da5bf22d34">LLVM&#95;DUMP&#95;METHOD</a> </Highlight><Highlight kind="keyword">static</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal"> </Highlight><Highlight kind="keywordtype">void</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal"> <a href="/docs/api/classes/llvm/sandboxir/vecutils/#a5aab9851dfd9576a31b7deb39728fcfe">dump</a>(<a href="/docs/api/classes/llvm/arrayref">ArrayRef&lt;Instruction &#42;&gt;</a> Bndl);</Highlight></CodeLine>
